derivation: from a derivative of (to range in regular line);
strongs_def: to march in (military) rank (keep step), i.e. (figuratively) to conform to virtue and piety
outline:
1. to proceed in a row as the march of a soldier, go in order
    1. metaph. to go on prosperously, to turn out well
  2. to walk
    1. to direct one's life, to live
